I can’t stand the noise from the construction going on next door.

{|彼|かれ|}が{|無口|むくち|で}、{|一緒|いっしょ|}に{?いる?}と{|退屈|たいくつ|}《でかなわない》。
1000580#1529940#1163400#1322180,1391500,1465580,1546640,1577980,1587780,2209310,2729170#1596750
He’s a man of few words. I can’t stand being with him because it’s so boring.
